title: Snackpass Privacy Center
description: Please use the tools below to request access to or deletion of your personal data used to provide Snackpass's services or consult our privacy policy below.

actions.title: Access your data
actions.description: We will text you a report of the data related to your account.

actions.title: Erase your data
actions.description: We will delete your account and all of its associated data within 45 days. This action cannot be undone: your account, rewards, punchcard points, etc. can never be recovered once deleted.

consentOptions.name: Advertising / Data Sharing
consentOptions.description: We may use some of your personal information for advertising performance analysis and audience modeling for ongoing advertising which may be interpreted as 'Data Sharing' under some regulations.

consentOptions.name: Product Analytics
consentOptions.description: We may use some of your personal information to collect analytics about how you use our products & services, in order to improve our service.
